availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Womble (Ballard Co. Master Carpenter)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, Master carpenter. Tennessee native. Married to Mildred A. Womble. Father of Julia Womble, Artimicia Womble, and Joseph Womble. Master carpenter in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Cobbs District, p. 97.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Lovelaceville District, p. 4.
Find A Grave, "John C. Womble (1832-1889)," Memorial #143965665, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/143965665 (accessed May 11, 2018).
